programme.title: Fred Dibnah's World of Steam, Steel and Stone
programme.desc: Documentary offering an insight into the steeplejack's love of steam-powered engines and machinery. After spending a large part of his life studying their construction and history, he passed on this knowledge in his programmes and highlighted the importance of steam power in Britain's past

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's World of Steam, Steel and Stone
programme.desc: The steeplejack's fascination with mining, which led him to dig his own coal mine in his back garden. Fred was also keen to teach viewers about the history of the industry, educating people about the dangers faced by those working down the pit, and the skills workers required

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the last leg of his journey through north-west England, Michael Portillo makes a clean sweep in Ashley, Cheshire, where in Victorian times the new middle classes set up home in suburban villas with multiple chimneys swept by children. In Macclesfield, he finds the end of the Silk Route and tries his hand at screen printing. Then after stoking the fire on the steam-powered Churnet Valley Railway, the former politician alights at Froghall, Staffordshire, heading for Alton Towers to trace the 19th-century origins of the theme park

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a new railway journey along the south coast of England. Beginning in the port of Dover, he takes a plunge into the English Channel, inspired by the example set by a brave 19th-century sea captain. A miniature steam train one third the size of a conventional locomotive conveys him from Romney Marsh to Dungeness, and in Eastbourne, he learns how the 7th Duke of Devonshire managed to market the town's attractions to the refined upper-crust of Victorian London. The first leg of his trip concludes in eccentric style at the Glyndebourne opera festival on the South Downs

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey to Leeds by travelling through Buckinghamshire, meeting one of the Second World War's most secret agents at Bletchley. In Olney, he learns about a poet whose words are still sung today, and explores the first purpose-built railway town at Wolverton. His last stop is Newport Pagnell, where he tackles the ancient craft of vellum-making

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: The next part of Michael Portillo's journey from London to Leeds begins in Northampton, where Victorian methods have been used to make shoes for more than 130 years. The ex-politician then heads to Warwickshire, learning about the legacy of Dr Thomas Arnold at Rugby School and finding out how Coventry's craftsmen learned to adapt to survive, before ending this leg of his trip in Nuneaton

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek picks out a solid-looking 1969 MGB for the team to look out for at auction. After winning it is sent to a father-and-son team to restore

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Dave alerts the team to a 1979 Lotus Esprit S3. It's an expensive buy and a serious risk, but it's also a thoroughbred classic in need of a proper recommission

programme.title: Nazi Hunters
programme.desc: The story of Hitler's former deputy Hermann Goering, who emerged from house arrest in May 1945 and made his way to American lines in the hope of surrendering to them rather than the Russians. After being imprisoned at Nuremberg, he committed suicide by poisoning in October 1946

programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Newhaven to Worthing, examining the nation's hidden defences, and taking in two magnificent engineering achievements - the Ouse Valley Viaduct and the Clayton Tunnel. programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Children's food educator Beth Stephens hosts the first dinner party in Lowestoft, Suffolk, where she plans to impress her guests - caravan site owner Ray, beauty therapist Polly, housing officer Jonalt and ASBO officer Rachel - with locally sourced seasonal food. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Caravan park owner Ray hosts the second night in Lowestoft, where he hopes to win the £1,000 prize with a Spanish-themed evening, complete with a homemade tropical zone and an Ibiza-style club night in a barn - despite it being the middle of winter

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Luxury-loving beautician Polly hosts the third evening in Lowestoft, Suffolk, and is determined to prove she is more than just a pretty face. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Albanian-born civil servant Jonalt hosts the fourth party of the competition in Lowestoft, Suffolk, and hopes his family recipes can impress his guests. He demonstrates a hidden talent that makes the diners laugh, and one contestant is left feeling the heat when Beth and Rachel unite

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The final dinner party in Suffolk is hosted by anti-social behaviour officer Rachel, who hopes to win over her guests with an evening of comfort food and a few tricks up her sleeve. She hates to lose, but will need to curb her comments towards the other guests and let her dishes do the talking if she wants to be in with a chance of beating joint leaders Holly and Jonalt

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lee and Louise from Warwickshire are looking for a three-bedroom, two-bathroom detached villa with a private pool in Villamartin on Spain's Costa Blanca, for their budget of £212,000. Leah Charles-King shows them five impressive properties, hoping at least one will be good enough to tempt Lee and Louise to make an offer

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: London couple Merwyn and Liesl Lobo are looking for a holiday home in Orihuela Costa in eastern Spain, so Danni Menzies shows them five properties for their £125,000 budget

programme.title: The Secret World of...
programme.desc: Jo Brand unwraps the nostalgic story of the world of sweets and lifts the lid on the biggest rivalries and innovations that have driven the sweet world. Jo unpacks the historic rivalry between Rowntree's and Bassett's before the cosy British sweet market gave way to a bitter battle after the arrival of Mars and Haribo, and key players from some of the industry's biggest brands reveal just how fierce the battle is to keep life sweet

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: Matt Lucas and Noel Fielding are back with the charity version of the baking show, as TV presenter Emma Willis, radio 1 DJ Clara Amfo, Taskmaster co-host Alex Horne and Inbetweeners actor Blake Harrison make their way to the tent. They take on three challenges - decorated biscuits, madeleines in the technical and a showstopping choux sculpture embodying their secret talent, with Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith passing judgement

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency?
programme.desc: One-off special following South Yorkshire Police investigating reports of bullying, from playground brawls and racism in schools, to coercive domestic abuse. Cases featured include a 14-year-old boy hospitalised by a gang in the street, a single vulnerable woman being systematically targeted by local teens in her own home, and a distraught mother watching her 27-year-old son attempting suicide after being bullied at work

programme.title: Good Boys (2019)
programme.desc: Three lads skip school and embark on an epic journey while carrying stolen drugs. They are hunted by teenage girls, and attempt to make their way home in time for a long-awaited party. Director Gene Stupnitsky's comedy, starring Jacob Tremblay, Keith L Williams and Brady Noon

programme.title: Derren Brown: Showman
programme.desc: This one-off special brings Derren Brown's record-breaking, five-star show to TV. Written by Derren Brown, Andrew O'Connor and Andy Nyman, the award-winning team behind Miracle, Svengali and Derren's BAFTA-winning Channel 4 specials, the critically acclaimed Showman is probably Derren's most personal show to date

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson presents as 22-year-old Ukrainian refugee Mariia enters the studio. Since fleeing the war, the pansexual sex therapist has settled in the UK and is now looking for love with a far-from-average man or woman who can keep up with her in the bedroom. She is followed by 24-year-old Alannah, a content creator from Bristol, who is seeking a forever bloke who can speak the language of love and feels comfortable in his body

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, critiquing The Outlaws, Family Fortunes, You, Celebrity Yorkshire Auction House and The Mating Game. They also offer their thoughts on ITV News of COP26 and other stories. Narrated by Craig Cash

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 69-year-old man is rushed to St George's after collapsing on a tennis court, and the resus team has to work quickly to get his dangerously high heart rate under control. Other patients include a father suffering from shortness of breath and a young man who sustained a head injury playing football. Newly qualified consultant Mehrad recounts what it's like to work under pressure and the satisfaction of saving a patient's life

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Holly Venning hosts the fourth dinner party from Cumbria and the food marketing manager wants to show her love for her home county through her menu. programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Fun-loving Karen and Irena kick-off the competition in Nottingham with a menu of comfort food. On day two, Lee and Maemae cook up an Indonesian menu with a British twist. Finally, it's Clayton and Nina's turn to up the ante with an evening of French fine dining

programme.desc: Amanda and Adam Cropper have been visiting Phuket in Thailand on holiday for some time and love it so much they decided to get married on the island. Now they're looking for their very own property there, initially to use as a holiday home before they move out full-time in the next few years. Jonnie Irwin guides them through the local market and shows them five properties for their £160,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Martial arts experts Dan and Sally Ferretti from Bristol have travelled the world for competitions, but are now looking to relax. Despite never having been to southern Spain before, this adventurous couple have decided to buy their very own holiday home there, and have identified the mountains around Malaga as the perfect place. Danni Menzies is on hand to show them five great properties for their £80,000 budget

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: A family of five begin searching for their dream home in Italy, and it's panic stations in France as the glampsite hosts prepare for their first guests

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: In Suffolk, Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien meet former agony aunt Janet, whose garden shed is crammed with goodies. With no motors to unearth, Henry makes a rare furniture discovery, while Simon finds a vintage tram bench

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In the Manchester area, 27-year-old full-time mum Johanna, plans an evening dedicated to takeways from Turkey to China and India. Her guests are 34-year-old lorry driver Ryan, 48-year-old housewife Fiona, 45-year-old laundrette owner Linzi and 53-year-old translator Nico, on a night that includes a sojourn into Shakespeare

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Manchester, lorry-driving movie buff Ryan plans a film-inspired menu including his 'Prawn Identity' starter, 'Sausage Meat the Fockers' and 'Chocolate Clockwork Orange' desert. Unfortunately the first course is more of a disaster movie for Johanna, who has to face her fear of prawns. Meanwhile, Nico puts the cat among the pigeons with his views on male chefs and Fiona takes Linzi to task over her beauty regime

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Glamorous 'domestic delegator' Fiona aims to impress with a classy but effortless menu as she hosts the third dinner party of the week in the Manchester area. However, critical Linzi takes issue with Fiona's mother chopping her vegetables and her cousin making her honeycomb. Then, there's more trouble brewing as Nico and Johanna clash

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Critical laundrette owner Linzi has been a hard taskmaster all week in the Manchester area, so expects to show her guests where they've been going wrong. She's not pleased when Ryan questions her choice of starter. When the guests find out what Linzi does for a job, Nico struggles to understand the concept of a laundrette. Self-proclaimed domestic delegator Fiona has to face her fears during Linzi's entertainment - an ironing competition

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: On the final night in the Manchester area, Nico plans to show the Brits how it's done in the kitchen with his Italian cooking. He's been talking up his Italian heritage all week, and Linzi's convinced he's heading for a fall. Ryan's shocked by some of Nico's locker-room tales, while baby of the group Johanna horrifies the other female contestants with her thoughts on gender politics. It remains to be seen who will pick up the £1,000 prize

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Newlyweds Alison and Gabriel from Greater Manchester have been together for five years and are looking to buy a property together in the town of Dénia on Spain's northern Costa Blanca. Craig Rowe lines up five properties for them to consider, all within their budget of £110,000

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Lea and her best friend Fiona are on the hunt for a second home in the Murcia region of Southern Spain, somewhere Lea feels will also help husband Peter's arthritis symptoms. Property expert Scarlette Douglas summons on her expertise to line up five options within the £90,000 budget

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Architect Henning Stummel and his partner Alice Dawson plan to convert a dilapidated joinery workshop in north London into a contemporary family home and office. They want to preserve the building's original steel frame, but to restore it they will have to take it down, which means carefully extracting it from the neighbours' walls without causing damage to their property - and that's just the start of the couple's problems. Kevin McCloud follows their progress

programme.title: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It: Brilliant Builds
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer look back at two shows that highlighted the need to get the balance between home and garden just right. In Bury St Edmunds, Lauren Grant believes the opportunity to build on a land she and husband Christian bought from the council will transform their confused downstairs. He, however, just wants rid of the house altogether. Meanwhile, Harrogate couple Carol and Andrew need extra space for Grandad. Can Kirstie build into their sizeable garden or will Phil find somewhere else more suitable?

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows

programme.title: xXx (2002)
programme.desc: Extreme sports star Xander Cage finds himself in trouble when his daredevil exploits land him behind bars. However, he is offered an intriguing escape route, courtesy of National Security Agent Augustus Gibbons - who thinks the adrenaline junkie is the perfect man to bring down a gang of international terrorists in Prague. Action adventure, starring Vin Diesel, Samuel L Jackson, Asia Argento, Marton Csokas and Michael Roof

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc: Greg Davies challenges the short-term memory and musicality of contenders Frankie Boyle, Ivo Graham, Jenny Eclair, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Mae Martin as the five intrepid comedians approach the halfway point in the series. Frankie impresses with his falsetto, while Kiell wows everyone with his spoon retrieval abilities. Plus, Mae fakes their way into assistant Alex Horne's wallet

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Anna Richardson presents as 22-year-old Ukrainian refugee Mariia enters the studio. Since fleeing the war, the pansexual sex therapist has settled in the UK and is now looking for love with a far-from-average man or woman who can keep up with her in the bedroom. She is followed by 24-year-old Alannah, a content creator from Bristol, who is seeking a forever bloke who can speak the language of love and feels comfortable in his body

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: A cheesemaker meets a marketer with an endless line of jokes, and a company director and a fan of motorbikes and rockabilly share their love of the 1950s. Two gym enthusiasts seem to hit it off, but disaster strikes later in the night, while two executives with a taste for sharp suits seem like a good fit

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts as Roisin Conaty and Kiri Pritchard-McLean take on Jon Richardson and Rob Beckett. Comedian Hugh Davies is in Dictionary Corner. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Estate agent Wendy Tinnion helms the final event in Cumbria and decides to throw a Friday night disco for her fellow diners. However, her guests are in for a shock when they discover something unexpected about their host

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Nottingham, three rival couples compete to host the best dinner party and win £1,000. Ultra-competitive accountants Omer and Adeeba serve up an experimental Asian menu. Sustainable food growers Bobby and Alison, who live in a yurt in the grounds of a grand stately home, dish out homegrown, organic food under the stars. On the final night, Liz and Stuart host, and Stuart realises that it might be an uphill battle to impress their rivals. None of their guests is aware that Stuart and Liz don't actually live together, but questions are raised when Adeeba and Alison don't find any of Stuart's clothes in the master bedroom, and Omer and Bobby discover Stuart's campervan with a double bed parked outside

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: TV presenter Kim Woodburn and her husband Pete decide they would like to take ownership of a holiday home on the Costa del Sol, so Jonnie Irwin takes them to view five penthouses that meet their £320,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: With retirement rapidly approaching, Jan and Phil Jackson wish to relocate to the Canary Island of Fuerteventura, having been inspired by Jan's sister who has already made the move there. Property expert Scarlette Douglas shows them five detached villas within their £215,000 budget

programme.title: A New Life in the Sun
programme.desc: In Portugal, a B&B gets busy after Covid restrictions ease, a family house-hunts in Italy and a couple in France race to finish renovating their holiday lets. Meanwhile, an ambitious trio hope to start a gin distillery in Spain, but get tied up in red tape

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: On the Isle of Wight, Henry Cole finds an unusual three-wheeled motorbike and Simon O'Brien unearths an old projector screen that he wants to turn into a work of art

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In north Surrey, planning enforcement officer Becky is joined by singing teacher Petrina, drum teacher Rob, solicitor Shoba and building company boss Giovanni. Becky plans to delight her guests with an evening of modern home-cooking and a menu including butternut, lamb and a deconstructed apple dessert. The week gets off to an intriguing start with young gun Rob taking a shine to Petrina and vice versa

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Solicitor Shoba hosts the second night in north Surrey, and tries to impress with an Indian-themed menu. However, the guests are less than impressed with the food, especially the main course - a curry made from frozen fish - but will a bit of belly dancing, Bollywood-style, help save the day? Meanwhile, singer Petrina and drummer Rob continue their flirting both at and away from the table

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Drum tutor Rob hosts the third night in north Surrey, hoping his Thai-themed menu will impress his guests, as well as the object of his affections, Petrina. He serves prawns with lemon, lime and chilli for his starter, Thai chicken curry for his main, and rounds off with his own take on an ice-cream sundae. As a single man living in his stepmother's house, Rob thinks his competitors will see him as an underdog, so is intent on pulling out all the stops

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Singing teacher Petrina hosts the fourth dinner party in north Surrey, and she believes her experience of entertaining on cruise ships will give her the edge as she plans a showstopper of an evening. However, the diners seem more interested in their host's continued flirting with fellow guest Rob. Will tonight be the night, or will he shy away when he discovers Petrina has sung in the West End and worked with dozens of household names?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Giovanni hosts the final night of the competition in north Surrey, intent on flying the flag for Sicily with some family inspired recipes. Even with help from his father, a tagliatelle tragedy leaves him with Parmesan on his face. Becky is less than impressed with Giovanni's dishes, and matters go from bad to worse when he attempts to serve his home-made pasta. However, poor food doesn't deter a romantic Rob from popping the question to Petrina, sending shockwaves across the dining room. In a final attempt to bag the £1,000, Giovanni invites an opera singer to liven up the proceedings, but his musical initiative may prove too little to save the day

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Joe and Kirsty fell in love after meeting at work three years ago. Now they want to swap their house in Hampshire for their perfect home in the warmer climes of inland Valencia, Spain. With a maximum budget of £280,000, the pair look to property expert Jean Johansson to help them realise their dream

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Liverpool pair Jeanette and Ian have dreamed for years about owning a holiday home by Spain's popular Mar Menor, and with retirement approaching they feel it's the right time to make that dream come true. Scarlette Douglas impresses them with five properties to choose between within their budget of £75,000

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: The host takes on a classic 1930s terraced home with a kitchen that's so tiny the fridge and oven have to live in another room. The two mismatched fireplaces are causing marital strife, with one of the couple loving the original 1930s one, and the other favouring the Victorian reproduction. Only one fireplace can stay in George's new art deco-inspired scheme. Plus, he revisits a Victorian home where George previously helped renovate the bottom two floors

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: A delivery driver is the victim of a carjacking and ends up being dragged along the road. On the M40, 13 stowaway migrants are found in a lorry full of tyres and in need of urgent medical care. A man collapses while having a fit in the middle of a busy road, and a woman experiences uncontrollable spasms in her legs at the stress of losing a child

programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: A 69-year-old man is rushed to St George's after collapsing on a tennis court, and the resus team has to work quickly to get his dangerously high heart rate under control. Other patients include a father suffering from shortness of breath and a young man who sustained a head injury playing football. Newly qualified consultant Mehrad recounts what it's like to work under pressure and the satisfaction of saving a patient's life

programme.title: 999: What's Your Emergency?
programme.desc: One-off special following South Yorkshire Police investigating reports of bullying, from playground brawls and racism in schools, to coercive domestic abuse. Cases featured include a 14-year-old boy hospitalised by a gang in the street, a single vulnerable woman being systematically targeted by local teens in her own home, and a distraught mother watching her 27-year-old son attempting suicide after being bullied at work

After complaints of all-night parties in a quiet street in Darwen, Lancashire, letting agent Paul pays the revellers a visit. The house is in terrible shape, but the young tenants promise they will clear it all up and keep the noise down. programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Andy Swift is on the lookout for a high-value car stolen from a dealership after being taken for a test drive, while he also searches for builder's van taken from a driveway while the owner popped briefly inside to collect his tools and equipment. programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: PC Tom Strachan gives pursuit when a car is spotted by police cameras being driven with no insurance, but when records flag up the suspect has a history of violence, an armed response team is called in too. The suspect throws a knife out of the car and then waves a baseball bat out of his window, banging it on the roof and making offensive hand gestures at the police behind him

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Pursued by a helicopter and a team of armed response vehicles, two men armed with machetes and a sawn-off shotgun make a dramatic escape on a motorbike. programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A suspect assaults Steve with his car keys, leaving the officer in need of urgent medical attention, while Charlie and Paul pursue a motorist who drove off from a garage without paying for fuel. programme.title: Police Interceptors

Cameras follow them as they run back and forth between the two bars, keeping their clientele of Bargain Loving Brits happy, fed and watered

programme.title: Shoplifters & Scammers: At War with the Law
programme.desc: Documentary following shopping centre security teams who are locked in a cat and mouse battle to catch criminals

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: The housing team in Harrow accompany the police on a raid after receiving reports of dangerous conditions at a home belonging to a notorious slumlord's brother. Lettings agent John wants to turn a former Blackpool hotel into bedsits, but a routine check on the property reveals not only a severely neglected house, but also a drugs den littered with paraphernalia and some of the worst conditions he has ever witnessed

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: During a busy spring bank holiday, the traffic cops deal with the effects of drink and drugs. A dangerous drunk, unlicensed and uninsured driver leads officers on a 20-minute chase through busy areas, while a suspected drugged driver runs across a supermarket car park to avoid arrest. The victims of a hit-and-run incident report a man who denies he was at the wheel

programme.title: Traffic Cops
programme.desc: Officers are on the look-out for a car linked to the theft of two motorbikes, but when they spot the vehicle parked up and it immediately races off forcing them into a chase. With stingers at the ready, it's not long before the getaway car's tyres are shredded and the suspects abandon the car and go on the run

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Officers pursue a driver who flees the scene of a road accident in a decommissioned ambulance, eventually abandoning the vehicle on a railway line after crashing through level-crossing barriers. Elsewhere, Warren comes under attack from a gang of youths on a garage forecourt, Spenner nicks a runaway driver with the help of a wheelie bin, and Kev is faced with a flaming Mercedes in the middle of rush hour

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A reckless driver gives Steve the slip in bad weather, but the suspect cannot escape the eye in the sky, while Ben has a run-in with an argumentative drink driver who fails three breath tests. Sophie and Chris surprise a disqualified driver in the team's unmarked car, and Warren is in high-speed pursuit of a stolen hatchback, concluding in a frantic foot race for rookie Kaine

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: In Huddersfield, officers are in pursuit of a van driver who smashed his van into a parked car before fleeing, while Bob and Dan pepper spray a suspect who is not keen on being handcuffed. Chris and Chris go after a stolen car whose driver gets too close to some railings, and the Operational Support Unit deal with a suspected heroin user carrying a number of bank cards and needles

programme.title: Shoplifters & Scammers: At War with the Law

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Eden steps into the spotlight and perfroms the song she privately wrote about Cash. Dean receives shocking news, and Tane feels like the last man standing in an empty family home

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Cash and Eden take their reunion back to the bedroom, but Felicity struggles to cope with the daily reminders of the pain she's causing. It may be time for her to leave Summer Bay

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: Two teenagers, one who has survived cancer and one with a parent who has the disease, discuss their fears and concerns. A patient who hurt her neck in a car crash comes in for further assessment. A first-time patient with mental health issues seeks support

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when three dehydrated survivors from a helicopter crash are discovered. The pilot is initially missing, but his body later washes ashore with a gunshot wound to the head. Things get complicated when one of the crew members tells the agents the chopper was hit by another aircraft, while another states that the pilot tried to kill them all by crashing into the sea on purpose. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The driver of a Ferrari is gunned down by a motorcyclist and the victim is identified as petty officer Colin Boxer, who was holding down a second job as a valet parker and had borrowed the sports car. The owner of the vehicle turns out to be Vijay Chaya, the billionaire head of a large corporation, and the team suspects a case of mistaken identity. During the course of the investigation, Gibbs chances on a medal awarded to Leroy Jethro Moore, the man he was named after and an estranged friend of his father. Guest starring Billy Dee Williams (The Empire Strikes Back) and Ralph Waite (The Waltons)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. First lieutenant Michael Torres gets involved in a fight before falling to the ground, and is found beaten to death the next morning. The only witness is his friend and colleague Captain Joe Westcott, who suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder and has trouble distinguishing reality from his past military experiences in the Middle East

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An answering machine message leads Briscoe and Curtis to reopen an investigation into an arson attack that killed a girl - but the 15-year-old suspect has a powerful ally in his grandfather, an influential force in political spheres. Award-winning police drama, guest starring Robert Vaughn (Hustle) alongside Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a Middle Eastern man sends Briscoe and Curtis racing to thwart a suspected terrorist plot to bring destruction to New York - and leads them to uncover a domestic conspiracy involving horrific female circumcision. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy faces bad memories when a drunk driver kills three people - and finds himself forced to protect the perpetrator in the process. Award-winning police drama, starring Benjamin Bratt and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Paramedics become suspicious about a baby's death, calling in Briscoe and Curtis, who discover the parents adopted the child from an illegal Russian ring. The case takes on another dimension altogether when it transpires that the crooks specialise in placing terminally ill infants with unsuspecting families. Starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Carmichael have the unenviable task of prosecuting three police officers with a racially motivated hate crime that threatens to cause uproar in the city. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Angie Harmon

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A narcotics detective plans a major drugs sting but makes the mistake of illegally using a teenager as bait - with fatal consequences. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team are called in when a Navy reservist returns home to find her husband missing and her living room covered in blood, and make a grim discovery when they find a finger in the bin. Meanwhile, Ziva ruffles a few feathers by insisting on continuing her investigation into the murder of her father, asking for permission to go to Rome on the trail of the chief suspect. Mark Harmon stars

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: New Mossad director Orli Elbaz asks for the team's help in finding Ilan Bodnar when one of her agents is shot dead in Virginia, telling Gibbs he was investigating several operatives who had gone rogue after Eli David's death. Ziva travels with Tony to Berlin in her pursuit of Bodnar, the man she believes was responsible for the death of her father. Guest starring Marina Sirtis (Star Trek: The Next Generation)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team tracks Bodnar's SUV to a remote house in the countryside, but inside find only his dead accomplice - identified as a South African mercenary who helped Bodnar procure diamonds. Ziva and Tony, meanwhile, discharge themselves from hospital and wheedle information out of Abby to continue investigating on the quiet, having been warned by Homeland Security to stay off the case

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The remains of several bodies are found buried in the ocean floor off the Florida coast, and as the team investigates further, Morgan is shaken by the thought that one of the victims could be his missing cousin. Crime drama, starring Shemar Moore

programme.title: Criminal Minds
programme.desc: The BAU discovers two bodies in the boot of a car and an agent faces a life-threatening situation during the hunt for the leader of a human-trafficking ring

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A dead bird is found in a murdered model's bag, leading the detectives to believe it is a coded Mob message, but as they investigate further, her sister believes a rapper called Gots Money is responsible for the crime. However, when tiger saliva is discovered on the victim's body, Stabler is forced to go undercover to confront a former people trafficker who is now involved in the exotic animal trade. Crime drama, guest starring Caitlin Fitzgerald and Outkast singer Antwan Andre Patton

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman claims to have been raped by a stranger to hide the fact she is a victim of domestic abuse, but later admits that her husband has been beating her because she does not want children with him. While conducting inquiries, Benson stumbles on a shockingly similar case involving the victim's elderly neighbour. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson goes undercover in a prison to investigate a teenage girl's claims that a guard raped her and has been threatening her jailed mother. Posing as an inmate, she tries to find evidence that systematic abuse is taking place - and faces a terrifying ordeal in the basement of the facility. Starring Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A corrections officer is arrested, accused of sexually assaulting his female charges both inside the prison system and beyond. As the case against the man begins to take shape, the union that supports him takes aim at Barba and the other members of the unit. Crime drama, starring Raul Esparza

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: A man is killed during a container truck robbery, and when Chloe calls Lucifer to help investigate the crime, he is reluctant to help - until he learns it was he who was robbed

programme.title: Criminals: Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Journalist Nick Wallis joins police forces around the nation to discover how CCTV and technological advances are helping to bring criminals to justice. The programme reveals how essential surveillance cameras have become in the fight against crime and features footage of people caught red-handed

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Tony reviews satellite footage of rebel forces in the Middle East and spots Kersey among a group of insurgents, concluding that Joe Westcott's fear of him was well-founded. Back at HQ, Abby creates a 3D computer model of the attack that occurred in Afghanistan and Joe dons a virtual-reality headset to relive the traumatic events. Will it jog his memory?

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Teenager Lydia Wade manages to escape a gang of masked men trying to abduct her and her friend Rosie, the daughter of a US Navy commander. Lydia's Navy captain father David Wade was shot dead during the attack and her mother is overseas, so Ziva offers to look after the girl, while Abby tries to jog her memory by creating facial reconstructions of the attackers based on some grainy CCTV footage. DiNozzo and McGee find links on Rosie's laptop to possible suspect John 'Diesel' Stevens

programme.title: Entertainment News on 5
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs is called to the scene when there is an attempt on the life of FBI agent TC Fornell, with the assailant identified as Navy seaman Tyler Brown. The pair team up and visit the bar where Brown worked and bump into their mutual ex-wife Diane Sterling, who was operating undercover as an employee suspected of stealing customers' identities. Joe Spano and Melinda McGraw guest star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: McCoy and Ross investigate when a restaurant becomes the scene of a shooting, and discover one of the diners is concealing a desire for revenge. Unfortunately, the object of their suspicion has a clever defence already up her sleeve - and only an expert witness can break her story. Sam Waterston and Carey Lowell star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A charity worker with a secret appetite for sordid encounters dies at the hands of a serial killer, but the defendant constructs a unique case by claiming the crime was the result of exposure to excessive violence on television. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Carey Lowell

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate when a male nurse is found beaten to within an inch of his life - but as they draw closer to their prime suspects, the shocking motives for the attack become clear. Gritty police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Curtis and Briscoe investigate after a child in day care is injected with a fatal disease. They uncover a medical scandal of frightening proportions, and the child's own father comes under suspicion. Award-winning police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate the murder of a doctor at a fertility clinic, but are embroiled in a dispute between two women over the ownership of frozen embryos. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The execution-style murder of a prison guard triggers an examination of the corruption apparently inherent in the state's penal system. Police drama, starring Sam Waterston and Angie Harmon

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A cook from a US Navy destroyer tells McGee and Gibbs he believes someone is stalking him with the intention of trying to make him poison the crew, and a picture on a stolen phone leads the team to a group testing the psychological effects of surveillance. Meanwhile, Richard Parsons from the Inspector General's office closes in on Ziva as he investigates the death of Ilan Bodnar, the man who killed her father. Guest starring Colin Hanks

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates when Navy Seal Chad McBride's wife receives a package from Riyadh in Saudi Arabia containing her husband's severed head, which Palmer discovers contains very high levels of radiation. McBride's commanding officer reveals the soldier was on a top-secret reconnaissance mission and asks Vance not to disclose the details to anyone. Meanwhile, Richard Parsons tries to get Gibbs to take responsibility for the many unnecessary deaths for which he holds the NCIS team accountable

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The American crime drama returns with the team still reeling from the Department of Defence investigation, with Ziva, McGee and Tony having handed in their badges. Parsons continues his inquiries into Gibbs and his agents, but events take a turn when an explosion kills the Secretary of the US Navy and seriously injures the director of Homeland Security. When attempts are made on the lives of Gibbs and Tony, it appears that all of the NCIS agents are in mortal danger. Starring Mark Harmon and Colin Hanks

programme.title: Blue Bloods
programme.desc: Erin prosecutes a woman accused of murdering her wealthy husband. However, the death of the accused's lawyer draws Danny into the case - and when he is called on as a witness for the defence, Erin is forced to cross-examine him in court. Meanwhile, Frank tries to discover who has fraudulently cloned his credit card, but is not pleased to find the evidence points to one of his favourite restaurants

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a marine who became pregnant after being raped on active service in Iraq brings the unit into conflict with the Pentagon. She is found to have been killed by a method taught to elite troops and Greylek has to fight the military to retain jurisdiction of the case, while Benson's flashbacks of her own sexual assault may be clouding her judgement. Starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman is left beaten and raped with no memory of what happened, putting Benson and Stabler on the trail of a serial offender who uses drugs to control women. They manage to locate the culprit, but the subsequent prosecution is hampered by a previous victim's refusal to testify and the case comes dangerously close to falling apart. Drama, guest starring Michael Trucco (Battlestar Galactica)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investment banker is found dead and suspicion falls on his boyfriend, a professional American football player desperate to keep his sexuality a secret. However, details of the case later appear in the media, calling Benson's relationship with the Press into question. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni, with Bill Pullman (Torchwood)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Stabler are drawn into a series of psychological games by Merritt Rook (guest star Robin Williams), an engineer whose obsessive hatred of authority proves popular with the public and wins him a cult following. Hard-hitting drama, with Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: The former Lord of Hell prepares to unleash his wrath on the thieves who stole his severed wings, as he enlists the aid of erstwhile ally Amenadiel to recover them

programme.title: Lucifer

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Returning from a six-month posting in the Gulf, Navy lieutenant commander Megan Huffner opens her front door to find her husband Noel dead in his chair. Gibbs and the team investigate and find the victim died three or four weeks earlier, and an unusual $100 bill in his wallet proves to be a vital clue. Meanwhile, Tony's father visits for Christmas and looks to rebuild their fractured relationship. Guest starring Robert Wagner

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. A man and his son on a fishing trip hook what appears to be the body of a petty officer, but the dead man turns out to be a journalist who had been investigating the proliferation of drugs in the Navy. Meanwhile, Ziva returns to her car after a workout at the gym to find her father Eli hiding inside. Guest starring Michael Nouri

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. After the deaths of two family members of NCIS employees, the team identifies the killer as a Swedish mercenary and the ballistics report reveals the bullets came from an Iranian arms dealer. McGee traces a wire transfer made to the hitman's ex-wife and son to an account under the name Virtue, and Ziva makes a connection after realising what the Hebrew translation is

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis come up against the Mob when a Mafia gangster-turned-FBI witness is found dead, and the investigation is hampered when the only lead fails to leave any evidence. Award-winning police drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The fatal stabbing of a psychologist draws Briscoe and Curtis into a heated divorce case and pits McCoy and Ross against a manipulative attorney who puts results before professional ethics. Award-winning American police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis investigate when a student is shot dead after a party gets out of control. The victim's boyfriend is arrested, but the officers later receive a tip-off about someone else - a vengeful youth deliberately infecting girls with HIV. Drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Steven Hill

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The detectives investigate the double murder of a wealthy man and his daughter, and the evidence leads them to suspect the wife and stepmother of the deceased are guilty

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A girl is killed in a crime displaying all the hallmarks of white supremacists who recruit teenagers to carry out acts of violence, and the team races to bring the ringleader to justice before more youngsters are butchered. Sam Waterston and Jerry Orbach star

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis re-examine a case closed since the 1960s after a vehicle containing the remains of a murdered man is dredged up from the Hudson River. Crime drama, starring Jerry Orbach and Benjamin Bratt

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Sarah Porter, the new Secretary of the Navy, charges Gibbs and the team with finding terrorist group the Brotherhood of Doubt, which was responsible for killing her predecessor. She expects the group's next target to be billionaire Tomas Mendez, who spends his money trying to defeat terrorism, but whose motives may not be entirely altruistic. Meanwhile, Tony flies to Tel Aviv, where new Mossad director Orli Elbaz reveals they have a report of a possible sighting of Ziva at a kibbutz she went to as a child. Crime drama, guest starring Marina Sirtis

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: An explosion at an apartment building brings navy officer Terence Keith to the team's attention and it transpires he had been on medication for anxiety, a condition that had led to him being ejected from a pilot's training course. Ducky's profile of Keith suggests that he may be unstable and about to exact revenge for having his dream of becoming a fighter ace taken away from him, and evidence points to him intending to carry out a suicide attack

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A woman is found murdered and Gibbs and McGee are called in when she is discovered to be carrying ID bearing the name Sgt Patricia Moreno, a US marine known to have died several years earlier. The victim is discovered to have come to America from Afghanistan and a necklace reveals a fingerprint that leads the team to a known assassin. Guest starring Lolita Davidovich

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team investigate when naval cryptanalyst Andrew Wells is shot dead in a park outside Baltimore. At the scene, Tony spots a man who was one of his informants from 15 years earlier when he was a police officer, but who went into hiding after a bid to bring down the Russian mobsters he worked for went wrong. Drama, starring Mark Harmon

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives investigate when a woman appears on a family's doorstep claiming to be their daughter, who went missing four years ago. She says she had been abducted and kept as a sex slave, and although some details of her story do not check out Benson is sure she has been abused, and is determined to uncover the truth of the case. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Chris Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives try to identify a teenager's body found in the Hudson River. They discover she had recently been in Ukraine and assume she had been trafficked for sex, but when they press a pimp for information he reveals he never met the victim - she was actually a maths prodigy and US citizen who attended a school for gifted students. Crime drama, starring Mariska Hargitay and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The body of a pregnant woman is found in a burnt-out building, triggering an investigation that leads the team to suspect a wealthy coffee trader and his son may be responsible. The case eventually goes to court, but a mistrial is declared - to the dismay of Novak, who vows to fight on regardless

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Chester Lake is suspected of murdering a police officer, and Fin's investigation into his history reveals he has been working with a freelance team solving cold cases. Details emerge that Lake has kidnapped the friend of a 14-year-old girl who was raped and murdered - but the focus turns to the dead cop as more evidence is uncovered. Drama, starring Adam Beach, Ice-T and Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: A priest arrives at Lux to ask for Lucifer's help in disentangling a teenager from local drug dealers. However, the fallen angel seizes the chance to question the man's sincerity

programme.title: Lucifer
programme.desc: Chloe and Lucifer suspect a case of patricide while investigating the murder of a poisoned restaurant owner. Meanwhile, Maze seeks Linda's help, and Chloe's actress mother visits

programme.title: The Yorkshire Auction House
programme.desc: Angus Ashworth and his team face the mammoth task of clearing a collection of bow top caravans, while a widower wants to sell a collection of stamps and Beatrix Potter figurines

programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin visits the Scottish Borders to help a couple of new parents with a budget of £650,000 to find their dream family home, which will hopefully offer business potential as well. While he is in the area, Jonnie visits a pioneering marine research station

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: The investigators of the Houston SPCA look back on some of the most shocking cases of animal cruelty, from the thousands dealt with each year

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip

programme.title: Monkey
programme.desc: Reluctant hero Monkey is accused of murdering a girl and her family, leaving Tripitaka with no choice but to send him home _ but it later emerges that demons are responsible for his plight

programme.title: Space 1999
programme.desc: An alien claiming to be the 'creator' offers to make a new Garden of Eden on Earth for the Alphans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Martin Landau and Barbara Bain

programme.title: The Bromley Boys (2018)
programme.desc: In 1969, with England preparing for the defence of their World Cup crown, 15-year-old David Roberts falls in love with his local non-league club, Bromley FC. While trying to enter the inner sanctum of the club's most loyal fans, David embarks on a seemingly sham relationship with the chairman's daughter, Ruby. Comedy, starring Brenock O'Connor and Jamie Foreman

programme.title: Silent Dust (1949)
programme.desc: A wealthy blind man plans a memorial to his dead son, only to discover he is still alive and has turned to crime. Drama, starring Stephen Murray and Beatrice Campbell

programme.title: Cat Hospital
programme.desc: Animal lover Eilish has been feeding the stray cats in her garden during lockdown, and contacts the clinic when she notices the health of one of them is beginning to deteriorate

programme.title: Danger Dogs
programme.desc: Documentary following dogs and their trainers as they are put through their paces in everything from sniffing out drugs to finding roadside bombs in conflict zones

programme.desc: Biopic of the gangster brothers, exploring their formative years. Starring Kevin Leslie, Simon Cotton and Nicola Stapleton

programme.desc: The survival expert explores the Norfolk and Suffolk Broads, a protected low-lying wetland of fens and reed beds that is home to one of the UK's largest arachnids, the fen raft spider. programme.title: William and Mary
programme.desc: William is distraught to learn his mother has suffered a serious stroke, and rushes to the nursing home to see her, arriving just before she dies. Admitting their relationship was not always a happy one, he resolves nevertheless to give her a send-off she would be proud off - only to receive shocking news at the reading of her will. Elsewhere, Molly strives to make amends with Mary, but she has enough to worry about in the form of a teenage girl about to give birth. Romantic drama, starring Martin Clunes, Julie Graham and Cheryl Campbell

programme.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum (1966)
programme.desc: A conniving slave in ancient Rome tries to win his freedom by helping his lovestruck master romance a virginal courtesan. Comedy musical, starring Zero Mostel, Phil Silvers, Michael Hordern and Buster Keaton

Comedy, starring Julie Walters, Ian Charleson and Stratford Johns

programme.title: Buster (1988)
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama about the life of Buster Edwards, a member of the gang responsible for the Great Train Robbery. Going on the run after the notorious heist, he flees to Mexico with his family. However, his homesick wife struggles to adapt to her new life, leaving the outlaw with a difficult choice. Starring Phil Collins, Julie Walters, Sheila Hancock, Larry Lamb and Ralph Brown

programme.title: Mysterious Creatures (2006)
programme.desc: Fact-based drama, starring Timothy Spall and Brenda Blethyn as the parents of a woman with mental health difficulties. The cast also includes Rebekah Staton and Judy Flynn

Unable to cope with the subsequent embarrassment, he ends their relationship and considers selling his business and making a fresh start in New Zealand, but Mary hears of his plans and rushes round, shocking him with a marriage proposal. Will love finally conquer all for the off-on couple? Romantic drama, starring, Martin Clunes, Julie Graham, Paterson Joseph, Cheryl Campbell and Michael Begley

programme.title: Mistresses
programme.desc: Joanna Lumley joins the cast of the drama about four women whose lives have all been touched by infidelity. Katie's mother has come back into her life, and is concerned about her daughter's destructive romances. Trudi's business is putting her relationship with Richard under intense pressure, Jessica pines for a baby and Siobhan's contentment with the single life comes to an abrupt end when her daughter's father reappears. Sarah Parish, Sharon Small, Shelley Conn and Orla Brady star

Spurs were managed by Harry Redknapp and had a strong run that led them to the final of the competition, having beaten the likes of Newcastle, Liverpool and Watford in previous rounds. The Red Devils had beaten Middlesbrough, Queens Park Rangers and Blackburn Rovers in the early rounds, before beating Derby County 4-3 on aggregate
